about_the_game:
When insurance companies dodge the responsibility, it’s up to you to save your daughter’s life. This will require some dirty work and shady clientele, but you have no other choice, right? When the big boss calls once again, bring a bucket and a mop cause you will really need them. Are you up for the challenge?

You need nerves of steel to clean crime scenes left behind by major and minor criminals. You may not have money for your daughter’s hospital stays, but what you do have is a very particular set of skills. With the help of an entire arsenal of equipment, you will clean blood, pack up bodies and remove any odor. All this under the pressure of a ticking clock and police breathing down your neck.

Key Features:

  • Deep Clean - Grab your trusty mop and sponge. They will be handy for the majority of the missions. And when the mess becomes too much whip out the powerwasher and deep clean outside spaces. Or when the smell is a bit too strong you have more than just an odor eliminator.
  • Arm’s Race - Sometimes the equipment you have is not enough and needs an extra oomph. If your lamps or flashlights are not strong enough, get new ones! If there will be too much blood outside, get a different set of power washer nozzles! So before every mission, check your storage and inventory, you may need something stronger and better.
  • Deep Pockets - Make money in any way you can! Mobsters are known for being generous, but sometimes that’s not enough. And certain objects may be too tempting. Who is going to miss this expensive watch? The owner’s already dead.
  • It’s about Family - With all the gruesome things you will see and do on every job, you must not forget that you are doing this for her. The life of a single father has its challenges and you need to overcome them all.

content_descriptors.notes: Crime and murder scenes. A large amount of blood. Scenes encountered by coroner investigators.

name: Crime Scene Cleaner Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: i5-6500 or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970 or similar
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: i5-9600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2070 SUPER
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Once you get tangled with the mob, you will forever be a part of the mob. At least they pay a decent salary and all you have to do is clean up after their dirty work, but you know what you’re doing. So clean crime scenes and get ready for the next mission.

English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
